content.rendered:
Home

Overview

Started by a team of enthusiastic financial professionals, software engineers and data scientists, the concept for Valutico as a tech enabled valuation platform was born out of frustration with the state of work in the many industries where valuations are an important matter.

Today, we empower our clients around the world by enhancing their analysis and operations whilst simplifying their processes through the use of the Valutico platform.

We are headquartered in Vienna, Austria and have subsidiaries in the UK and US.

Our Mission

Leveling the playing field in valuation advisory

Valuation advisory is a complex area.

We give you the tools to complete at the highest level.

Watch our platform in action:

Our Story

Valutico was born out of frustration with the lack of quality support available to Valuation Practitioners. User-friendly, dependable, analytical tools were in short supply to assist valuation professionals with efficient, in-depth analysis.

The Question

While spending yet another weekend in the office of a global investment bank, one of our founders was asking himself why it’s common practice to re-invent the wheel with every new valuation assignment.

2014

The Idea

Everybody has an Excel template from back in the day, a few PowerPoint slides, and maybe access to one of the financial databases. But why isn’t there something that brings it all together? – One seamless, integrated solution… The idea for Valutico is born.

The Beginning

Not being able to find any existing solutions, our founder sets out to define the cornerstones of what will later become Valutico.

The Changing Environment

Regulatory changes (MiFID II, IDW S1, KFS BW1, etc) further embolden the team in their quest to build an integrated valuation platform

2015

The Prototype

Our CTO comes on board and a first simple prototype is built as a proof of concept. Hello world.

2016

The Feedback

With very positive initial market feedback a small core team continues to build the platform in their spare time – with eyes and ears always open to the market.

2014-2016

While spending yet another weekend in the office of a global investment bank, one of our founders was asking himself why it’s common practice to re-invent the wheel with every new valuation assignment. Everybody has an Excel template, a few PowerPoint slides, and maybe access to one of the financial databases. But no one offered a seamless, integrated solution that wouldn’t break if edited too many times. The idea for Valutico is born.

After researching the market and being joined by our founding CTO, initial market feedback proved positive and a small core team started to build the platform in their spare time – with eyes and ears always open to the market.

Traction with early customers and regulatory changes (MiFID II, IDW S1, KFS BW1, etc) further embolden the team and in created the tipping point for a full launch…

The Connectivity

Agreements with market data providers are reached and the world’s leading databases are integrated into the platform.

2017

The Launch

Valutico goes live towards the end of the year and first paying clients are onboarded.

2017

Agreements with market data providers are reached and the world’s leading databases are integrated into the platform and Valutico goes live towards the end of the year and first paying clients are onboarded.

The Expansion

Our team grows further as we expand within the DACH region.

2018

2018

Our team grows further as we expand within the DACH region.

The Product Market Fit

Valutico empowers over 100 financial market participants and valuation practitioners around the world to seamlessly perform valuation analyses of the highest standards. The need is validated and the potential to define a new category is here for Valutico to seize.

2019

The Growth Phase

Valutico establishes a London office and doubles in size. Further expansion across EMEA and the US begins at pace.

2019

Valutico establishes a London office and doubles in size. Further expansion across EMEA and the US begins at pace.

Valutico empowers over 100 financial market participants and valuation practitioners around the world to seamlessly perform valuation analyses of the highest standards. The need is validated and the potential to define a new category is here for Valutico to seize.

2020 and Beyond

Valutico is now in use in 26 countries, and represented by team members and partners on 5 continents. Join our journey to create a new generation of valuation professionals, to raise the bar for valuations around the world and to help our customers grow their business with technology enabled solutions to their corporate finance needs.

Trusted by the world’s leading advisors and auditors:

Our Values

Valutico is used in high stakes projects. We understand the requirements to deliver at the highest levels and hold ourselves to the following values:

Customer first

Our number #1 goal: Your success

Passion

Creating a new generation in valution with Valutico’s tech enabled valuation platform

Integrity

The security of your data is our priority

Excellence

No black box, only best practices

Meet the Team

Paul Resch

Co-founder & CEO

Alex Lachinger

Co-founder & CMO

Daniel Krueger

CPO

Stephan Karner

COO

Careers

Want to be a part
of our team?

Valutico is expanding globally to support our mission, we’re always looking for talented individuals.

See Openings

Our Offices

(HQ) Austria

Web Value GmbH

Siebensterngasse 54
1070 Vienna

United Kingdom

85 Great Portland Street
London, W1W 7LT
+44 (0) 7723 584386

United States

2035 Sunset Lake Road
Newark, DE
